questions.title: Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters
questions.prompt: Given a string s, find the length of the longest substring without repeating characters.
followups: What is the invariant maintained by the sliding window?
What is the time complexity and why?
How would you return the substring itself, not just length?

questions.title: Group Anagrams
questions.prompt: Given an array of strings, group the anagrams together. You can return the answer in any order.
followups: What key do you use for grouping?
What is the complexity of your approach?
How would you optimize for large alphabets?

questions.title: Top K Frequent Elements
questions.prompt: Given an integer array nums and an integer k, return the k most frequent elements.
followups: Can you do better than O(n log n)?
What is the time and space complexity?

questions.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
questions.prompt: Given the root of a binary tree, return the level order traversal of its nodes' values (from left to right, level by level).
followups: Why is BFS a good fit here?
What is the time and space complexity?
How would you return a single flattened list instead?

questions.title: Coin Change (Minimum Coins)
questions.prompt: Given an integer array coins representing coin denominations and an integer amount, return the fewest number of coins needed to make up that amount. If it’s not possible, return -1.
followups: What’s the DP state and transition?
How would you also reconstruct the actual coins used?
